column4: how can i install only one driver from the kernel and not the whole kernel ?
if i elemenate all the others and just install the driver i want , compile and instsall it will be ok ?
you can use make-kpkg modules-image , if you have compiled your kernel
for instance i want to install only driver , pci , sound, intel HD.......
make-kpkg is not installed what apt-get?
if you are using the ubuntu kernel, you can simply modprobe
any link cause i am noob?
the drivers should have been loaded auto :( run: lsmod
